settings.title: Our Misssion
settings.content: Connecting trendy shoppers to various styles and designs at affordable prices. The I.O. Domani brand originated in Los Cabos , Mexico as a "Sip.Shop.Socialize" boutique and continues today. We currently offer product shipping to the USA & most USA territories. Shipping to Mexico is only available to Baja California Sur at this time. However, we will do our best to expand shipping options to regions.
